question: What is the major adverse effect of adriamycin(doxorubicin)?
ideal_answer: Cardiac toxicity is a major adverse effect caused by doxorubicin (DOX) therapy

snippets.text: It remains to be seen whether inhibition by adriamycin of these systems is related to the severe cardiotoxicity, the major adverse effect of the drug that limits its clinical usefulness.
